## RubiN PR Checklist (required for spec/governance-sensitive changes)

- [ ] Is this a consensus change?  (yes / no)
- [ ] If yes, where are the VERSION_BITS activation parameters documented?
- [ ] Which conformance vectors were updated?
- [ ] Which theorem IDs were touched/added/removed?
- [ ] Which assumptions were updated for affected claims?
- [ ] Which epsilon accounting rows/entries were updated (if relevant)?
- [ ] If this PR changes consensus wording indirectly through /operational or /formal paths, cite /spec rationale:
  - [ ] Included explicit cross-reference(s) to spec lines

## Reviewer notes
- If you are uncertain about a normative interpretation, mention assumptions explicitly below.
- If any of the above is not applicable, explain "N/A" with reason.
